channel.title: beta on Chef Habitat Builder on-prem documentation
channel.description: Recent content in beta on Chef Habitat Builder on-prem documentation

item.title: Artifactory
item.description: Using Artifactory as the object store (Alpha) If you are interested in using an existing instance of Artifactory as your object store instead of Minio, we are providing this capability as an early preview/alpha for testing. To set this up, you will need to have the following: Know the URL to the Artifactory instance Know (or generate) an API key to authenticate to the instance Create a repo for the Habitat artifacts Once you have the above, modify the your bldr.
